text:
With H.R. 7790, Congress is acting quickly to ensure that families have access to safe & affordable nutrition for their babies. It also helps prevent the sale of fake formula & provides Congress w/ data to address issues in the infant formula market. 
https://t.co/PsQM2QMUab

I look forward to supporting this bill, which ensures that the existing baby formula supply is safe & back on shelves. I’m also eager to lead this week’s @AppropsDems hearing on identifying how this food safety failure occurred & finding ways to prevent it from happening again. https://t.co/fcraXKfnmg

Watch the @AppropsDems hearing with @USNavy and @USMC now as we discuss the projects and funding needed to provide our sailors, marines, and their families the quality of life they deserve: https://t.co/HzBVfuTzuD

Congress must work closely with @FTC & @SECGov as they ensure markets are competitive & fair for all Americans. Join me & @AppropsDems @ 10 AM as we meet w/ administration officials to ensure they are doing just that: https://t.co/q9rV8JlzG8

The Workforce Innovation & Opp. Act reauthorizes programs like Job Corps (JC) which supports the Turner JC Center in Albany, GA. This is an example of how this bill strengthens connections b/t employers, schools, & job training to help economies flourish. https://t.co/WAfqnM3fyv

Vivian & I were saddened to learn of the passing of Former State Rep. Ed Rynders. Ed was an outspoken public servant & advocate who worked hard to improve the lives of SW Georgians. Our thoughts & prayers go out to his wife & the entire Rynders family. https://t.co/KUP9b4nbTC

Community Action Agencies were on the front line helping communities hit by COVID by distributing food & emergency resources. Leaders at every level recognize the impact this program has on the quality of life in our nation's communities including GA-02. https://t.co/ANDEUslSLb
